install.name: Like it? Share it!
install.author: JBookmarks.com
install.description:
The Premiere Social Bookmarking Module for Joomla 1.5.x - JBookmarks.
To configure, go to Extensions -> Module Manager, and look for "Like it? Share it!" in the modules list. Click on it and enable the icons you wish to have show.
When an icon within the module is clicked, the site will open up in a popup window adding the url, and title and description if the social bookbarking site supports this feature.
Thanks for supporting our work!

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: wong
param.label: Enable Mr. Wong
param.description: Mister Wong is Europe's largest social bookmark portal, with over two million visitors per month.

param.name: wongl
param.label: Alternative TLD
param.description: The default TLD is .com, unless one is specified. Alternative TLD's currently available for Mr Wong are ( .es | .fr | .de | .ru | .cn ). Specify only one.

param.name: ximmy
param.label: Enable Ximmy
param.description: A social bookmarking site that pays you $5 for signing up as an affiliate, and $0.50 for every referral.

param.name: buzka
param.label: Enable Buzka.com
param.description: Buzka is a free and easy way to share your favorite web stuff. You can save and organize all your favorite web pages by creating Spots on any interest or topic.

param.name: powerl
param.label: default language.
param.description: The default is en, unless one is specified. Alternative languages's currently available for Power-Oldie.com are ( de | en ). Specify only one.

param.name: newskickl
param.label: If you don't want use default domain, example: .com
param.description: If you don't want use default domain, example: .com. Please note that the special domain must exist!
